name: lesson_34
description: - GET http://cats-application.com/api/cat READ -> getCats() <- Получение всех котов  - GET http://cats-application.com/api/cat/10 READ -> getCatById() <- Получение одного котика по айди - POST { "name": "Murzik", "image": "someurl" } http://cats-application.com/api/cat CREATE -> createNewCatId() -> createCat(id) <- id | Cat - PUT { "name": "Barsik" } http://cats-application.com/api/cat/10 UPDATE -> updateCatById(id, catData) <- id - DELETE http://cats-application.com/api/cat/id -> removeCatBydId(id) <- id
